art.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
art.author: Pablo Picasso

art.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
art.author: George Bernard Shaw

art.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
art.author: Pablo Picasso

art.quote: A painter should begin every canvas with a wash of black, because all things in nature are dark except where exposed by the light.
art.author: Leonardo da Vinci

art.quote: Painting is poetry that is seen rather than felt, and poetry is painting that is felt rather than seen.
art.author: Leonardo da Vinci

art.quote: Art is the lie that enables us to realize the truth.
art.author: Pablo Picasso

art.quote: You must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star.
art.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

art.quote: The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious - the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
art.author: Albert Einstein

art.quote: If you ask me what I came to do in this world, I, an artist, will answer you: I am here to live out loud.
art.author: Émile Zola

art.quote: Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time.
art.author: Thomas Merton

humour.quote: I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.
humour.author: Douglas Adams

humour.quote: Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand.
humour.author: Kurt Vonnegut

humour.quote: Going to church doesn’t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile.
humour.author: Billy Sunday

humour.quote: If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you are now.
humour.author: Cassandra Clare

humour.quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
humour.author: Phyllis Diller

humour.quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
humour.author: Cathy Guisewite

humour.quote: I did not attend his funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
humour.author: Mark Twain

humour.quote: Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy.
humour.author: Albert Einstein

humour.quote: Sometimes you climb out of bed in the morning and you think, I'm not going to make it, but you laugh inside — remembering all the times you've felt that way.
humour.author: Charles Bukowski

humour.quote: The planet is fine. The people are fucked.
humour.author: George Carlin

inspiration.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
inspiration.author: Oscar Wilde

inspiration.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
inspiration.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspiration.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
inspiration.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspiration.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
inspiration.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspiration.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
inspiration.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

inspiration.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
inspiration.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspiration.quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
inspiration.author: Marilyn Monroe

inspiration.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
inspiration.author: Albert Einstein

inspiration.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
inspiration.author: Bil Keane

inspiration.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
inspiration.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
life.author: Dr. Seuss

life.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
life.author: Marilyn Monroe

life.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
life.author: Mae West

life.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
life.author: Robert Frost

life.quote: Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results.
life.author: Narcotics Anonymous

life.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
life.author: Allen Saunders

life.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.
life.author: André Gide

life.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
life.author: J.K. Rowling

life.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
life.author: Mark Twain
